path: /Users/arpithaprakash/Capstone/3-2CR CONOPs&DRAWs/New folder - Copy (32)/Range 112_240 and 249 Range 13-14MAR CONOP.pptx

sections.PURPOSE: of this Qualification is to qualify Kronos Troop Primary and Alternate Gunners for the M240 and M249.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Identify Safeties and Trainers
Conduct Mounted MVT to the Range
Range Set up
Overnight Memo
sections.END STATE:
All Kronos Troop Primary and Alternate M240 and M249 Gunners are qualified on their weapon systems.
Training Objectives:
Each 240 Gun Team has their Gunner and AG Qualified on their Weapons System (14 240 Gunners in Total)
Each 249 in Troop has a Qualified Primary and Alternate Gunner (36 249 Gunners in Total)
Resourcing
CLI: A-A-A Rations Cycle
CLIII: 6 liters CLP
CLIV: N/A
CLV: Requested CLVIII: K31, with CPL Stovall as Medic Misc: 2x 10lb Fire extinguishers, C-Wire, Pallets, and Tarps for Ammo Point, 300 Paper Targets for Zero
240 TC: TC 3-22.240
249 TC: TC 3-22.249
Back Side Support
OIC: 1L:T Wuerthner
RSO: SSG Voss
Safeties: SSG Carrasco, SGT Barker, SGT Cox, SSG Mitchell Instructors if needed provided by Section 1x NCO for Ammo Point (SGT Montalvo)
2x PAXs for Gate Guard
2x PAXs for Overnight Ammo Guard
sections.MISSION:
K TRP, 3/2CR conducts M240 and M249 Qualification for all Kronos Troop 240 and 249 Gunners at RNG 112 on 13-14MAR 2024. This qualification will provide Kronos Troop with a Qualified Primary and Alternate gunner for each 240 and 249 Weapons System.
LOA DOG
RANGE 112
